casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG et al. v. DE FOREST RADIO TELEPHONE & TELEGRAPH CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 7, 1924.) No. 130. Darby & Darby, of New York City (Samuel E. Darby, Jr., and A*. Leo Everett, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Charles Neave and Stephen H. Philbin, both of New York City, for appellees.

Beforé ROGERS, HOUGH, and MANTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Our opinion filed to-day in the case of Perfection Cooler Co. v. Rotax Co., Inc., 296 Fed. 464, completely covers this matter, and requires that the appeal be dismissed without costs.
